Text: The Iliupersis (Greek: Ἰλίου πέρσις , "Iliou persis", "Sack of Ilium"), also known as The Sack of Troy, is a lost epic of ancient Greek literature.

<The story of the "Iliou persis"
3:
--------------------
Text: Iliupersis:  The "Iliou persis" was sometimes attributed by ancient writers to Arctinus of Miletus (see Cyclic poets).
Triplets:<Arctinus of Miletus

Text: Iliupersis:  The poem comprised two books of verse in dactylic hexameter.
